walkthrough.step.dependencies.descriptio: Open the Dependencies view and ensure every item shows as up to date.
walkthrough.step.validate.description: Select a package.xml or Apex class and execute the "UAV: Validate Apex Code" command.
walkthrough.step.reports.description: Open the Reports and Logs views to inspect the generated files after a run.
walkthrough.step.configureEinstein.descr: Open Settings > Unified Apex Validator and fill `sfClientId`, `sfClientSecret`, `sfGptEndpoint`, and `sfGptModel`. The Dependencies view will show AI as ready once all fields are set.
walkthrough.step.configureWorkspace.desc: Set `sfRepositoryDir` and `outputDir` in Settings so UAV knows where your metadata lives and where to drop reports. Adjust `sfCliPath` only if the Salesforce CLI is not in PATH.
walkthrough.step.connectOrg.description: Make sure the Salesforce CLI has a default org: run `sf org login web --alias myOrg` (or use your preferred auth flow) and verify it appears in `sf org list`. UAV will use the org marked as default when validating.
walkthrough.step.stayUpdated.description: Review the extension settings and follow the GitHub changelog for new features, fixes, and improvements.

config.title: Unified Apex Validator Settings
config.skipIAAnalysis.description: Skip the IA powered analysis stage.
config.iaPromptTemplate.description: Base prompt used when generating ApexDoc with the IA assistant.
config.maxIAClassChars.description: Maximum number of characters sent to the IA model per class.
config.classDocTags.description: List of ApexDoc tags enforced on class headers.
config.methodDocTags.description: List of ApexDoc tags enforced on methods and constructors.
config.classDocTags.markdownDescription: List of ApexDoc tags for the class header. Empty tags are inserted when missing.
config.methodDocTags.markdownDescription: List of ApexDoc tags for methods and constructors. Missing tags are added as empty placeholders.
config.apexDocLanguage.description: Language used for generated ApexDoc content.
config.sfCliPath.description: Path to the Salesforce CLI executable when not present in PATH.
config.reportLanguage.description: Default language for generated HTML/PDF reports.
config.outputDir.description: Output folder where generated reports are stored.
config.keepLogFiles.description: Keep logs and temporary files after a successful run.
config.enableAllmanFormatter.description: Enable the Allman Apex formatter commands and context menus.
